evidence.text: In October 2023, Plaintiff Erie County, New York, applied for a grant from Defendant Corporation for National and Community Service... In January 2024, Americorps approved the grant... On January 20, 2025, the President signed Executive Order 14151... On February 14, 2025, Americorps sent Erie County a letter... Erie County brings this action seeking injunctive and declaratory relief

add_extracted.value: Erie County applied for RSVP grant in 2023, approved in 2024; Americorps demanded DEI certification under new executive orders leading to lawsuit seeking injunctive/declaratory relief

evidence.text: Plaintiff Erie County New York hereby dismisses this case without prejudice, pursuant to Rule 41, because Defendant has changed its certification requirements since the filing of this suit. The motion for a preliminary injunction filed on March 21, 2025 (ECF No. 5), is accordingly withdrawn.
